author: srimanob
body:
#### PR description:
This PR follows https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/37078, to fix M9 geometry. In case we don't move to D88 in the near future, we plan to use D77 to vallidate DDD-vs-DD4hep of Phase-2. No change is expected for existing DDD wf (as see in the #37078).

#### PR validation:
Test with wf 35034.911 (TTbar NoPU D77 DD4hep XML)

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:
Not a backport and no need of backport.
title: Fix dtSpecFilter of M9 and add DD4hep wf for D77
